column5:
One of my favorite things in the world is seeing a movie that has scenes in NYC and trying to locate exactly where it is in the city. 

Here is a list of movies I’ve seen that are based in, have scenes in, or just reference NYC. 

No particular order

column2: Once Upon a Time in Queens
To All the Boys: Always and Forever
Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
A Rainy Day in New York

column5: Tribeca is mentioned. I’d say that counts towards this list.

column2: Birdman or (The Unexpected Virtue of Ignorance)

column5: NYC gets shown being nuked in a small scene
There is a single reference to people watching updates on the astronauts in Times Square.
Opening movie set is supposed to look like NYC
